DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if ziprasidone is safe and effective for the treatment of children and adolescents (ages 10-17) with bipolar I disorder (manic or mixed).
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Trial of Flexible Doses of Oral Ziprasidone in Children and Adolescents With Bipolar I Disorder
DOC.criteria: DSM V criteria for Bipolar I disorder (manic or mixed); age 10 17 years. Imminent risk of suicide or homicide, as judged by the site investigator; any history of serious or unstable medical illness, including risk for QT prolongation.
DOC.keyword: Bipolar I Disorder (current or most recent episode manic). Children and adolescents aged 10 to 17 years.
